activities: Corvisa provides hosted voice PBX and contact center software with customer relationship management system integration.  Corvisa may collect personal information, such as name, phone number, website, and email address in our normal course of business. This will occur either through use of our company website or directly through our products and services. When an individual engages Corvisa through our website he/she may choose to provide personal information to Corvisa. In this scenario, the information will be used by Corvisa to improve the products and services Corvisa provides its customers.  When using Corvisa products and services, customers and their users may provide Corvisa with personal information in the form of log-ins to our systems. This information is used to facilitate access to and to monitor the use of our products and services.  The core functionality of Corvisa products and services can be configured to collect end user voice communications, recordings, associated data, and client contact information.  This data may include personal information such as names, phone numbers, and call detail records.  As Corvisa grows, it may collect personal information on personnel in the EU/EEA and/or Switzerland in the normal course of business.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Organization, client, customer, visitor, human resources data. Received on-line, off-line and also manually processed.
recoursemech: For non-HR data, Corvisa uses the Better Business Bureau EU Safe Harbor Program to resolve disputes.  (http://www.bbb.org/us/european-dispute-resolution/).  For HR data only, Corvisa will cooperate with the EEA data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC), as applicable.
